titleStmt.title: A manuel of controversies clearly demonstrating the truth of Catholique religion by texts of Holy Scripture, councils of all ages, Fathers of the first 500 yeers, common sense and reason, and fully answering the principal objections of Protestants and all other sectaries / by H.T.
titleStmt.author: Turberville, Henry, d. 1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
